verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%>, and the <S%H1397>man<s%> who was raised <S%H6965>up<s%> on <S%H5920>high<s%>, the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and the <S%H5273>sweet<s%> <S%H2158>psalmist<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>said<s%>,
The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> by <S%H4405>me<s%>, and his word was in my <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.

The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4910>me<s%>, He that rules over <S%H120>men<s%> must be <S%H6662>just<s%>, <S%H4910>ruling<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And he shall be as the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rises<s%>, even a <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H5645>clouds<s%>; as the tender <S%H1877>grass<s%> springing out of the <S%H776>earth<s%> by clear <S%H5051>shining<s%> after <S%H4306>rain<s%>.

Although my <S%H1004>house<s%> be not so with <S%H410>God<s%>; yet he has <S%H7760>made<s%> with me an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, <S%H6186>ordered<s%> in all <S%H8104>things<s%>, and sure: for this is all my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, and all my <S%H2656>desire<s%>, although he make it not to <S%H6779>grow<s%>.
But the sons of <S%H1100>Belial<s%> shall be all of them as <S%H6975>thorns<s%> thrust <S%H5074>away<s%>, because they cannot be <S%H3947>taken<s%> with <S%H3027>hands<s%>:

But the <S%H376>man<s%> that shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> them must be <S%H4390>fenced<s%> with <S%H1270>iron<s%> and the <S%H6086>staff<s%> of a <S%H2595>spear<s%>; and they shall be <S%H8313>utterly<s%> <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> in the same <S%H7675>place<s%>.

These be the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> whom <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8461>had<s%>: The Tachmonite that <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H7675>seat<s%>, <S%H7218>chief<s%> among the <S%H7991>captains<s%>; the same was <S%H5722>Adino<s%> the <S%H6112>Eznite<s%>: he lift up his spear against <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, whom he <S%H2491>killed<s%> at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> him was <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite<s%>, one of the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%>, when they <S%H2778>defied<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> that were there gathered <S%H622>together<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gone <S%H5927>away<s%>:

He <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3588>until<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H3021>weary<s%>, and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1692>split<s%> unto the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>worked<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him only to <S%H6584>plunder<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> him was <S%H8048>Shammah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H89>Agee<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite<s%>. And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were gathered <S%H622>together<s%> into a <S%H2416>troop<s%>, where was a <S%H2513>piece<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5742>lentil<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

But he <S%H3320>stood<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H2513>ground<s%>, and <S%H5337>defended<s%> <S%H5221>it<s%>, and killed the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>worked<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory<s%>.

And <S%H7969>three<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> in the harvest <S%H7105>time<s%> unto the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H5725>Adullam<s%>: and the <S%H2416>troop<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> was then in an <S%H4686>hold<s%>, and the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> was then in <S%H1035>Beth<s%>–lehem.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H183>longed<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Oh that one would give me <S%H8248>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Beth<s%>–lehem, which is by the <S%H8179>gate<s%>!

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> broke <S%H1234>through<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Beth<s%>–lehem, that was by the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H935>it<s%>, and brought it to <S%H1732>David<s%>: nevertheless he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H5258>there<s%>, but poured it out unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Be it <S%H2486>far<s%> from <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord, that I should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1818>this<s%>: is not this the blood of the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> in jeopardy of their <S%H5315>lives<s%>? therefore he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>. These things did these <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>.

And <S%H52>Abishai<s%>, the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%>, was <S%H7218>chief<s%> among <S%H7992>three<s%>. And he lifted <S%H5782>up<s%> his <S%H2595>spear<s%> against <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, and <S%H2491>killed<s%> <S%H8034>them<s%>, and had the name among <S%H7969>three<s%>.
Was he not most <S%H3513>honorable<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%>? therefore he was their <S%H8269>captain<s%>: but he <S%H935>attained<s%> not unto the first <S%H7969>three<s%>.

And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, of <S%H6909>Kabzeel<s%>, who had done <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6467>acts<s%>, he <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> lionlike <S%H739>men<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>: he went <S%H3381>down<s%> also and <S%H5221>killed<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of a <S%H953>pit<s%> in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7950>snow<s%>:

And he <S%H2026>killed<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, a <S%H4758>good<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>: and the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> had a <S%H2595>spear<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; but he went <S%H3381>down<s%> to him with a <S%H7626>staff<s%>, and <S%H1497>plucked<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> out of the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H5221>killed<s%> him with his own <S%H2595>spear<s%>.
These things <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>, and had the <S%H8034>name<s%> among <S%H7969>three<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>.

He was more <S%H3513>honorable<s%> than the <S%H7970>thirty<s%>, but he <S%H935>attained<s%> not to the first <S%H7969>three<s%>. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> him over his <S%H4928>guard<s%>.
<S%H6214>Asahel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> was one of the <S%H7970>thirty<s%>; <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%> of <S%H1035>Beth<s%>–lehem,
<S%H8048>Shammah<s%> the <S%H2733>Harodite<s%>, <S%H470>Elika<s%> the <S%H2733>Harodite<s%>,
<S%H2503>Helez<s%> the <S%H6407>Paltite<s%>, <S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6142>Ikkesh<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoite<s%>,
<S%H44>Abiezer<s%> the <S%H6069>Anethothite<s%>, <S%H4012>Mebunnai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite<s%>,
<S%H6756>Zalmon<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite<s%>, <S%H4121>Maharai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite<s%>,

<S%H2460>Heleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1196>Baanah<s%>, a <S%H5200>Netophathite<s%>, <S%H863>Ittai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7380>Ribai<s%> out of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>,
<S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite<s%>, <S%H1914>Hiddai<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash<s%>,
<S%H45>Abi<s%>–albon the <S%H6164>Arbathite<s%>, <S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%> the <S%H1273>Barhumite<s%>,
<S%H455>Eliahba<s%> the <S%H8170>Shaalbonite<s%>, of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3464>Jashen<s%>, <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>,
<S%H8048>Shammah<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite<s%>, <S%H279>Ahiam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8325>Sharar<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite<s%>,

<S%H467>Eliphelet<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H308>Ahasbai<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H4602>Maachathite<s%>, <S%H463>Eliam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> the <S%H1526>Gilonite<s%>,
<S%H2695>Hezrai<s%> the <S%H3761>Carmelite<s%>, <S%H6474>Paarai<s%> the <S%H701>Arbite<s%>,
<S%H3008>Igal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah<s%>, <S%H1137>Bani<s%> the <S%H1425>Gadite<s%>,
<S%H6768>Zelek<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%>, <S%H5171>Naharai<s%> the <S%H886>Beerothite<s%>, armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%>,
<S%H5896>Ira<s%> an <S%H3505>Ithrite<s%>, <S%H1619>Gareb<s%> an <S%H3505>Ithrite<s%>,
<S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>: <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and seven in <S%H7651>all<s%>.
